Description: A short series of images made with p5.js. I just wanted to be creative and make some cool design using code.

Clouds.description: A cloud created with a lot of dots and using the noise function.

Circles.description: A cool figure made with a lot of circles.

Rectangles.description: Using noise to make rectangles look cool.

Alien_landscape.description: A lanscape coming from another planet made with noise.
